text: Soni nganitutumisyeje paujo penu (mmwe Muhammadi ï·º) ntenga jwalijose namuno ntume, ni ikaweje kuti juchisoomaga, shetani waponyaga (malowe gaunami) mu kusooma kwakweko, basi Allah ni wafutaga yawaponyaga shetaniyo, kaneka Allah ni wagalimbanganyaga ma Aya Gakwe, sano Allah ni Jwakumanyilila nnope, Jwalunda lwakusokoka
